dialogue.title: Compendium 2 Module
dialogue.content: Do you want to save this compendium as a module?

edit.title: Compendium 2 Module: Simple Export
edit.description: Here you can modify the different aspects of the compendium module, like the id, display name or author. If no change is made, the default values will be used.

advanced.title: Compendium 2 Module: Avanced Export
advanced.description: Here you can choose which compendiums to include in the exported module and adjust its settings. Tick the checkbox next to a compendium to include it in the export.

json.title: Compendium module: <displayName>
json.description: A module containing the exported <displayName> compendium.
